title: MoJ Data and Analytics Engineering Tech Radar

rings.name: ADOPT
rings.description: Technologies we have high confidence in to serve our purpose, also in large scale. Technologies with a usage culture in our production environment, low risk and recommended to be widely used.

rings.name: ASSESS
rings.description: Technologies that are promising and have clear potential value-add for us; technologies worth to invest some research and prototyping efforts in to see if it has impact. ASSESS technologies have higher risks; they are often brand new and highly unproven in our organisation. You will find some engineers that have knowledge in the technology and promote it, you may even find teams that have started a prototyping effort.

rings.name: HOLD
rings.description: Technologies that we think are not (yet) worth to investigate and not recommended to be used for new projects.

rings.name: RETIRE
rings.description: This technology or technique has now been superseded, stop using for new projects. Can usually can be continued for existing projects if migrating to the replacement technology is significant.
